text: The University of Cincinnati is a public university in Cincinnati, Ohio. The university has about 41,357 students. It was founded in 1819. The current president of the university is Gregory H. Williams. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Bearcats. They have 18 varsity teams and they compete in the Big 12 Conference. ==Other websites== *University of Cincinnati's Official website *Cincinnati Bearcats' Official athletics website Category:Big 12 Conference Category:Colleges and universities in Ohio Category:Cincinnati Category:1819 establishments in Ohio
title: University of Cincinnati
